casebody.data:
EPSTEIN, Respondent, v. HODGETTS, Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. February 5, 1894.) Appeal from city court. Action by Alfred Epstein against Charles Hodgetts.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER. BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Johnston & Johnston, for appellant. Epstein Bros., for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to go to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 25 N. Y. Supp. 1141.
